column5: So close I can smell it....  excited to try out my new bait cast deal!  gunna be a great season this year. im gunna get off my lazy a$$ and get out there! lol. its about time to invest in a little more tackle too..... damn salmon took most of it...... (berkley vanish=crappy line). im goin through withdrawls not havin any whitefish on the table. shoulda took you up on your offer TDunn! haha, oh well who knows i might see you at the locks goin for them tasty buggers. (i'll be the only one sitting on the bare pavement lol).  Who else is shakin' with excitement?   JP
anticipation is dripping in my waders.....well i hope its anticipation....
Got the planer boards out today, another 3 weeks and its brown trout hunting time in Lake O!!!
Funny we are still waiting for the  hard water season.    Art
LOL  right on man!   really? theres no ice? maybe virginia is a little further south than i think, lol.   JP
march madness is about to set in. can't wait to fish fish flooded rivers that look like flowing double doubles!
Just bought a Croix Legend Walleye and ordered a Legend Extreme, went today and applied for financing for a 2010 Honda 50hp Tiller for my new boat.....yah I'm not excited for Open Water...
Excited as ever to take my baitcaster out for a spin! Someone posted it last year, but Roll up the Rim to Win is IN! Another sign of spring!
is it?  i gotta go get  one then.  JP
Just put in my yearly Cabelas order, new trolling motor, new rods, new tackle, it's going to be a great year for fishing!
3rd sat in May is a long way off for me to even think about it...
Ummm..... Isn't the 2nd Saturday...? Wouldn't want to wait longer than I have to!  Michael
..be the 3rd Saturday where I'll be by that date...  2nd Saturday in 16 and others though..
justin the problem is you havent been out on the ice this year your getting cabin fever
Sounds like it makes a good case for leaving late! Hope you'll weather the wait!  Michael

Actually the lakes and ponds get some ice and even the slow rivers get it on the edges. None of it is safe so we get to wish about fishin without getting to fish. The bigger rivers usually stay free so boat fishing is possible for all of the species.   Art
i told you already, the rapala fishing frenzy for the wii is keeping me under control right now
I'm exctied to see how fast the Etec starts after almost 6 months of sitting:)
